system.sustained: Focus Power Test has -10. If Successful, psyker creates Permenant Fettered Strength Telepathic Connection to another being that requires no further effort to maintain. Automatically works as long as target and psyker remain within this power's range. If target dies, the bond dissolves and the Psyker gains 1d10 Insanity from the Backlash. To remove the Bond, Psyker must make -20 Willpower Test, which can be done at any time. Can only have one Mental Bond at a time.
